title: Embroidered Picture, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal, glass beads, paint 
Technique: chain and satin stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Pavilion with inscription "A l'amitie" and a bird placing a wreath on an altar.  Trees, grass, chapel and priest as borders.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: silk, metal, glass beads, paint 
Technique: chain and satin stitches on plain weave. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-144.
